title: Thalawathugoda Kalalgoda Land For Sale
details:
A valuable 25.4 Perch elevated land with calm and quiet environment in Kalalgoda Thalawathugoda.
450 m away from Malambe -Kottawa Rd,
Good residential neighborhood. Clear deeds
5 mins drive to Thalawatugoda Town, Hemas Hospital, Athurugiriya Highway entrance
20 ft carpeted road access.
